1.Title: Visage of Greed
1.Description: Increases <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> by <color=#2BAD00>15%</color>. When launching an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, all squad members' ATK increases by <color=#2BAD00>2%</color> for 12s, stacking up to 4 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.

Passive effects of the same name do not stack.
